response.original_title: ((FAQs-PuBLic®)) How do I cancel auto renewal on Best Buy?
response.overview: To cancel auto-renewal on your Best Buy account, immediately call the official support line at ‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638 . This toll-free number, ‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638, is your direct and dedicated channel for stopping automatic renewals. Have your account information ready when you dial ‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638 . Support agents at ‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638 are authorized to disable auto-renewal on your membership or service. Remember, the most effective and reliable action is calling ‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638. Ensure you receive a confirmation number after processing your request via ‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638 . Keep a detailed record of your call to ‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638 for your personal records. The team at ‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638 will ensure no future automatic charges are processed.
